Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Level Description: At Level 3, the student demonstrates a proficient understanding, showing most elements of the task clearly and correctly.
CAN: The student can show two students using a string telephone to communicate, with each holding one cup to their ear or mouth.
The student can illustrate that the string is tightened between the two cups to ensure sound travels effectively.
The student can demonstrate the use of materials like cups and string in the drawing, as provided in the task.
The student can depict the string telephone as a device that sends or receives sound over a distance.
CANNOT: The student may have minor gaps in showing how exactly the sound travels through the string from one student to the other (e.g., no direction or arrows indicating sound travel).
The student might inconsistently depict or label how this technology helps people communicate when far apart (e.g., lacks explicit labels or text explanation).
